sections.purpose: To provide high-frequency sound waves for cleaning glassware or degassing solvents.
sections.scope: Applicable to sample preparation and cleaning in Pharmaceutical Chemistry.
procedure: Fill the bath with water and a suitable cleaning agent up to the operating level.
Switch ON the power and set the timer and temperature if required.
Place the glassware or solvent bottles in the wire basket.
Lower the basket into the bath ensuring the items are submerged.
Press 'START' to begin the ultrasonication cycle.
Once complete, remove the items and rinse them with distilled water.
Turn OFF the bath and drain the water periodically.
Wipe the interior of the bath with a soft cloth.
precautions: Never operate the bath without water, as this will damage the transducers.
Do not place items directly on the bottom of the bath; always use a basket.
Avoid placing your hands in the bath while it is operating.
Degas the bath water for 5-10 minutes before first use for maximum efficiency.
Use appropriate detergents that are compatible with the material being cleaned.
